header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: API and backend solutions engineer with 6 years of experience. Develops high-quality and robust service solutions using a variety of tools including SQL databases, NoSQL databases, and event streams. A strong knowledge of cloud best-practices and a history of deploying dozens of applications to live environments with hundreds of thousands of users. AWS cloud practitioner certified. Expertise in Scala, Go, Python, and TypeScript.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: I developed live micro-services with APIs that helped teams share data more easily amongst eachother (ex. Kinesis Replicator, Kinesis Snapshotter, and Openlineage service)
I built a tool to automate the deployment of data ingestion pipelines. It unified GitHub queries, Jenkins jobs, Databricks API calls, and Slack notifications calls to deploy and manage pipelines.
I developed build pipelins in Jenkins and GitHub Workflows to compile, test, and run verification steps on my team and other teams codebases. This includes the work I did with generating code.
I worked with Kubernetes, Datadog, and AWS CloudWatch to monitor and ensure production stability.

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: I developed a tool to query blockchain transactions using key-field and full-text searches. The service was deployed with a MongoDB for indexing data and could be accessed using an authenticated Protobuf endpoint with query streaming support.
I developed an API for managing staking and wallet keys in blockchain nodes.

I implemented end-to-end API tests using Postman with CI/CD integration using the Newman test runner. The tests provided coverage over API use-cases and also provided documentation for end users on how to call the API's actions.

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: I implemented new pages, components, and functionality for a cloud web application for managing construction software
